articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: This US company to terminate employees who aren't vaccinated by April
articles.description: It follows a US Supreme Court ruling on January 13 that blocked President Joe Biden's Covid-19 vaccination-or-testing mandate for large businesses
articles.content: T-Mobile US Inc will fire corporate employees who are not fully vaccinated against COVID-19 by April 2, according to an internal company memo posted on the independent blog TMOnews.com.
